languages.text: "Экклезиархия когда-то пыталась взрастить из меня достойного проповедника, однако, будучи малодушным и зарвавшимся сопляком, я решил, что такая жизнь мне не по нраву. Я променял достойную жизнь в свете Императора на жажду наживы и то, что я тогда называл свободой. Я стал пиратом, Ваша Светлость".

traits.locale_text: "Экклезиархия когда-то пыталась взрастить из меня достойного проповедника, однако, будучи малодушным и зарвавшимся сопляком, я решил, что такая жизнь мне не по нраву. Я променял достойную жизнь в свете Императора на жажду наживы и то, что я тогда называл свободой. Я стал пиратом, Ваша Светлость".

languages.text: "The Ecclesiarchy once tried to make a decent preacher out of me, but fainthearted and brash young brat that I was, I decided that wasn't the life for me. I traded a worthy life in the Emperor's light for greed and what I thought of as freedom at the time. I became a pirate, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."
languages.original_text: "Экклезиархия когда-то пыталась взрастить из меня достойного проповедника, однако, будучи малодушным и зарвавшимся сопляком, я решил, что такая жизнь мне не по нраву. Я променял достойную жизнь в свете Императора на жажду наживы и то, что я тогда называл свободой. Я стал пиратом, Ваша Светлость".

I traded a worthy life in the Emperor's light for greed and what I thought of as freedom at the time. I became a pirate, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

I traded a worthy life in the Emperor's light for greed and what I thought of as freedom at the time. I became a pirate, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

I traded a worthy life in the Emperor's light for greed and what I thought of as freedom at the time. I became a pirate, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

I traded a worthy life in the Emperor's light for greed and what I thought of as freedom at the time. I became a pirate, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

I traded a worthy life in the Emperor's light for greed and what I thought of as freedom at the time. I became a pirate, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

"The Ecclesiarchy once tried to make a decent preacher out of me, but fainthearted and brash young brat that I was, I decided that wasn't the life for me. I traded a worthy life in the Emperor's light for greed and what I thought of as freedom at the time. I became a pirate, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

languages.text: “国教曾打算把我培养成一名正统的布道士，但那个时候，我只是个胆小又傲慢的毛头小子，我认为我不该过那样的生活。于是，在贪婪与所谓‘自由’的驱使下，我舍弃了帝皇明光之下的正派人生，加入了海盗的帮派，大人。”
languages.original_text: "The Ecclesiarchy once tried to make a decent preacher out of me, but fainthearted and brash young brat that I was, I decided that wasn't the life for me. I traded a worthy life in the Emperor's light for greed and what I thought of as freedom at the time. I became a pirate, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: “国教曾打算把我培养成一名正统的布道士，但那个时候，我只是个胆小又傲慢的毛头小子，我认为我不该过那样的生活。于是，在贪婪与所谓‘自由’的驱使下，我舍弃了帝皇明光之下的正派人生，加入了海盗的帮派，大人。”

languages.text: 「帝国聖教会は一度、私をまともなプリーチャーにしようとしましたが、臆病で図々しいクソガキだった私は、そんな人生を歩みたくないと決めつけていました。皇帝陛下の御光で仕える立派な人生を欲と取り替え、当時は理想の自由を手にしたと思っていた。私は海賊になったんです、 陛下」
languages.original_text: "The Ecclesiarchy once tried to make a decent preacher out of me, but fainthearted and brash young brat that I was, I decided that wasn't the life for me. I traded a worthy life in the Emperor's light for greed and what I thought of as freedom at the time. I became a pirate, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: 「帝国聖教会は一度、私をまともなプリーチャーにしようとしましたが、臆病で図々しいクソガキだった私は、そんな人生を歩みたくないと決めつけていました。皇帝陛下の御光で仕える立派な人生を欲と取り替え、当時は理想の自由を手にしたと思っていた。私は海賊になったんです、 陛下」

languages.text: «La Eclesiarquía intentó hacer de mí un predicador decente, pero como era un mocoso, decidí que esa vida no era para mí. Cambié una vida digna al servicio del Emperador por la codicia y lo que en su momento consideraba libertad. Me convertí en pirata, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: "The Ecclesiarchy once tried to make a decent preacher out of me, but fainthearted and brash young brat that I was, I decided that wasn't the life for me. I traded a worthy life in the Emperor's light for greed and what I thought of as freedom at the time. I became a pirate, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: «La Eclesiarquía intentó hacer de mí un predicador decente, pero como era un mocoso, decidí que esa vida no era para mí. Cambié una vida digna al servicio del Emperador por la codicia y lo que en su momento consideraba libertad. Me convertí en pirata, mi{mf|lord|lady}».

languages.text: "Die Ekklesiarchie hat einmal versucht, einen anständigen Prediger aus mir zu machen, doch ich war jung, frech und willensschwach. Ich habe entschieden, dass das nicht das richtige Leben für mich ist. Ich habe ein würdiges Leben im Licht des Imperators gegen Gier eingetauscht ... und gegen das, was ich damals für Frieden hielt. Ich bin Pirat geworden, Eure {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft."
languages.original_text: "The Ecclesiarchy once tried to make a decent preacher out of me, but fainthearted and brash young brat that I was, I decided that wasn't the life for me. I traded a worthy life in the Emperor's light for greed and what I thought of as freedom at the time. I became a pirate, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: "Die Ekklesiarchie hat einmal versucht, einen anständigen Prediger aus mir zu machen, doch ich war jung, frech und willensschwach. Ich habe entschieden, dass das nicht das richtige Leben für mich ist. Ich habe ein würdiges Leben im Licht des Imperators gegen Gier eingetauscht ... und gegen das, was ich damals für Frieden hielt. Ich bin Pirat geworden, Eure {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft."

languages.text: « Quand j'étais plus jeune, l'Ecclésiarchie a tenté de faire de moi un prêcheur, mais craintif et imprudent comme j'étais, j'ai décidé que ce n'était pas pour moi. Plutôt que de vivre dans la lumière de l'Empereur, j'ai laissé libre cours à ma cupidité et opté pour ce que je croyais être la liberté, à l'époque. Je suis devenu pirate, Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: "The Ecclesiarchy once tried to make a decent preacher out of me, but fainthearted and brash young brat that I was, I decided that wasn't the life for me. I traded a worthy life in the Emperor's light for greed and what I thought of as freedom at the time. I became a pirate, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: « Quand j'étais plus jeune, l'Ecclésiarchie a tenté de faire de moi un prêcheur, mais craintif et imprudent comme j'étais, j'ai décidé que ce n'était pas pour moi. Plutôt que de vivre dans la lumière de l'Empereur, j'ai laissé libre cours à ma cupidité et opté pour ce que je croyais être la liberté, à l'époque. Je suis devenu pirate, Votre Seigneurie. »

languages.text: "Bir zamanlar Ekleşiarşi beni düzgün bir vaiz hâline getirmeyi denedi ancak yüreksiz ve aceleci bir velet olduğum için bunun bana uygun bir hayat olmadığına karar verdim. İmparator'un ışığına layık bir yaşam sürmektense, açgözlülüğü ve o zamanlar özgürlük olduğunu sandığım şeyi tercih ettim. Bir korsan oldum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
languages.original_text: "The Ecclesiarchy once tried to make a decent preacher out of me, but fainthearted and brash young brat that I was, I decided that wasn't the life for me. I traded a worthy life in the Emperor's light for greed and what I thought of as freedom at the time. I became a pirate, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: "Bir zamanlar Ekleşiarşi beni düzgün bir vaiz hâline getirmeyi denedi ancak yüreksiz ve aceleci bir velet olduğum için bunun bana uygun bir hayat olmadığına karar verdim. İmparator'un ışığına layık bir yaşam sürmektense, açgözlülüğü ve o zamanlar özgürlük olduğunu sandığım şeyi tercih ettim. Bir korsan oldum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
